mapper.select: select * from article where status = 0 and (title like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') or cont like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%'))

select a.id, a.title, a.cont, a.diamond_count as diamondCount, a.read_count as readCount, a.like_count as likeCount, a.publish_time as publishTime, (select count(*) from comment c where c.article_id = a.id) as commentCount from article a where a.corpus_id = #{corpusId} and a.status = 0
